title: Will "Juggernaut Update" type stuff happen for classes like Assassins, Supports, Mages, Marksmen
body: They have made the Juggernaut Update for Tank/Fighter (Garen, Darius, Skarner, Mordekaiser). Do you think they will do the same thing for other classes for example, Assassins (Shaco, Katarina, etc),  Mages (Ahri, Annie, Lux, etc),  Supports (Sona, Braum, Janna, etc),  Marksmen (Caitlyn, Kalista, Urgot, etc)
